window.title: NB TestUI

dialog.config_duplicate_section.message:
Duplicate test ID found: {identifier}
Please fix and reload.
dialog.config_load_failed.title: Configuration Error
dialog.config_load_failed.message: Failed to load configuration. Fix duplicate test IDs first.
dialog.test_in_progress.title: Test In Progress
dialog.test_in_progress.message: A test is currently running. Please stop it or wait until it finishes.
dialog.missing_sn.title: Missing Serial Number
dialog.missing_sn.message: Please enter the DUT serial number.
dialog.reset_running.title: Reset Flags
dialog.reset_running.message: A test is running. Stop it before resetting flags.
dialog.reset_failed.title: Reset Flags
dialog.reset_none.title: Reset Flags
dialog.reset_none.message: No finished run is available to reset.
dialog.clear_failed.title: Reset Flags
dialog.reset_cleared.title: Reset Flags
dialog.reset_cleared.message: Cleared latest run snapshot for SN {sn}.
log.latest_snapshot_cleared: Cleared latest run snapshot for SN {sn}.
dialog.prompt.label: Please enter {field}:
dialog.input_error.title: Input Error
dialog.prompt.dut_sn.title: Enter DUT Serial Number
dialog.finished_pass_required.title: Reset Required
dialog.finished_pass_required.message: SN {sn} previously finished with PASS (status: {status}). Reset flags before testing again.
log.previous_run_summary: Loaded previous run: SN={sn}, run_id={run_id}, status={status}

dialog.debug_password_missing.message: Debug password is not set or invalid.

dialog.debug_password_retry.title: Incorrect Password
